Title: The Bostonians
Plot: Dawson is a freshman film student in Los Angeles, while Joey starts college at an Ivy League university in Boston. Instead of focusing on the new lives they have worked a lifetime for, they find themselves distracted by the distance between them and their unsettling last kiss.
GuestStars: Alan Fudge, Ned Brower, Sallie Hedrick, Rand Courtney, Brianne Davis, Colter Allison, Corie Berkemeyer, Matthew Smith, Feel Love Fury
